docs.text: Contributing Contributing guidelines Before contributing TODO Contributing Contributor TODO Contribution TODO Pre-commit plugin Use pre-commit to automatically format your code to match our coding style: python3 -m pip install pre-commit # only required the first time pre-commit install That's it! The plugin will run every time you commit any changes. If there are any errors found during the run, fix them and commit those changes. You can even run the plugin manually on all files: pre-commit run --all-files --show-diff-on-failure Coding Style TODO Other Requirements for Submissions TODO
docs.title: Contributing

docs.title: Contribution

docs.text: Use pre-commit to automatically format your code to match our coding style: python3 -m pip install pre-commit # only required the first time pre-commit install That's it! The plugin will run every time you commit any changes. If there are any errors found during the run, fix them and commit those changes. You can even run the plugin manually on all files: pre-commit run --all-files --show-diff-on-failure
docs.title: Pre-commit plugin

docs.text: CLI Reference This page provides documentation for our command line tools. main Pub/Sub Data Generator and Helper Functions. Args: ctx (click.Context): Click context. project_id (str): GCP project it. Usage: main [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --project-id TEXT GCP project id. --help Show this message and exit. pub Publisher helper commands. Args: ctx (click.Context): Command context. Usage: main pub [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit. csv-sample Generate messages sampling data from a CSV. Args: ctx (click.Context): Command context. topic_id (str): Pub/Sub topic id. file (str): CSV File that we will use to sample data. msg_format (str): Format of result message[dict|csv]. num_iterations (int): Number of records. sleep_ms (int): Time to wait after each message(ms). dry_run (bool): Disable sending messages to pub/sub. create_topic (bool, optional): Create topic. Defaults to False. Usage: main pub csv-sample [OPTIONS] Options: --topic-id TEXT Pub/Sub topic id. [required] --file TEXT CSV File that we will use to sample data. --msg-format TEXT Format of result message[dict|csv]. --num-iterations INTEGER Number of records. --sleep-ms INTEGER Time to wait after each message(ms). --dry-run Disable sending messages to pub/sub. --create-topic Create topic. --help Show this message and exit. wiki Run Random Wiki publisher. Args: ctx (click.Context): Command context. topic_id (str): Pub/Sub topic id. num_iterations (int): Number of records. dry_run (bool): Disable sending messages to pub/sub. Usage: main pub wiki [OPTIONS] Options: --topic-id TEXT Input PubSub topic id. [required] --num-iterations INTEGER Number of records. --dry-run Disable sending messages to pub/sub. --create-topic Create topic. --help Show this message and exit. sub Subscriber helper commands. Usage: main sub [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit. simple-sub Run Simple Message Subscriber. Usage: main sub simple-sub [OPTIONS] Options: --subscription-id TEXT Input PubSub subscriber id. [required] --timeout INTEGER Time to run the command. --create-sub Create a subscription in case it does not exists. --topic-id TEXT Pub/Sub topic id. --help Show this message and exit. utils Utils commands. Usage: main utils [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit. create-sub Meh. Usage: main utils create-sub [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. create-topic Meh. Usage: main utils create-topic [OPTIONS] Options: --help Show this message and exit. 1 :list_subcommands true
docs.title: CLI Reference

docs.text: This page provides documentation for our command line tools.
docs.title: CLI Reference

docs.text: Pub/Sub Data Generator and Helper Functions. Args: ctx (click.Context): Click context. project_id (str): GCP project it. Usage: main [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --project-id TEXT GCP project id. --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: main

docs.text: Publisher helper commands. Args: ctx (click.Context): Command context. Usage: main pub [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: pub

docs.text: Generate messages sampling data from a CSV. Args: ctx (click.Context): Command context. topic_id (str): Pub/Sub topic id. file (str): CSV File that we will use to sample data. msg_format (str): Format of result message[dict|csv]. num_iterations (int): Number of records. sleep_ms (int): Time to wait after each message(ms). dry_run (bool): Disable sending messages to pub/sub. create_topic (bool, optional): Create topic. Defaults to False. Usage: main pub csv-sample [OPTIONS] Options: --topic-id TEXT Pub/Sub topic id. [required] --file TEXT CSV File that we will use to sample data. --msg-format TEXT Format of result message[dict|csv]. --num-iterations INTEGER Number of records. --sleep-ms INTEGER Time to wait after each message(ms). --dry-run Disable sending messages to pub/sub. --create-topic Create topic. --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: csv-sample

docs.text: Run Random Wiki publisher. Args: ctx (click.Context): Command context. topic_id (str): Pub/Sub topic id. num_iterations (int): Number of records. dry_run (bool): Disable sending messages to pub/sub. Usage: main pub wiki [OPTIONS] Options: --topic-id TEXT Input PubSub topic id. [required] --num-iterations INTEGER Number of records. --dry-run Disable sending messages to pub/sub. --create-topic Create topic. --help Show this message and exit.
docs.title: wiki

docs.text: Subscriber helper commands. Usage: main sub [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]... Options: --help Show this message and exit.

docs.text: Run Simple Message Subscriber. Usage: main sub simple-sub [OPTIONS] Options: --subscription-id TEXT Input PubSub subscriber id. [required] --timeout INTEGER Time to run the command. --create-sub Create a subscription in case it does not exists. --topic-id TEXT Pub/Sub topic id. --help Show this message and exit.
